articles.author: Olaf Storbeck, Michael O’Dwyer
articles.title: EY banned by German audit watchdog over Wirecard work - Financial Times
articles.description: Big Four firm cannot take on listed companies as new clients for two years
articles.content:
EY has been banned from taking on any new listed audit clients in Germany for two years over failures in its work for collapsed payments company Wirecard.
The landmark ruling by the countrys audit w… [+3779 chars]

articles.title: Virgin Orbit Ceases Operations, Lays Off Staff - Mentour Pilot
articles.description: In a message to staff, the Virgin Orbit CEO announced that the company will lay off all but 100 people, and effectively cease operations.
articles.content:
